snippet.title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD - PS3/Vita/PC release trailer
snippet.description:
Out now on PC, PS3. Available from 19 December on Vita.

Return to Oddworld as the mysterious Stranger, on a mission to rid Western Mudos of villainous outlaws whilst raking on the rewards! Use the crossbow with some of the wildest ordinance. It's live ammo... literally! Fire mouthy Chippunks or psychotic Fuzzles giving unique ways of bagging bounties.
